item.title: Bronze Age History of the Second Realm
item.description: Overview The Bronze Age was a period of societal development in intelligent species where innovations such as the use of bronze in tools and complex magic use were made out of the neolithic period, or Late Stone Age, where magic was more basic and tools were only made of stone.

item.title: Sarvaran History
item.description: Overview %%Sarvara was founded by the Mora clan of the nomadic Early Morellic Tribes, who migrated into the Sarvaran river basin from the northeastern steppes.
